entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -21.1°C

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
